description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7lums","text":"This is the protocol to scan brain neuromelanin with reduced impact of the chemicals on their original colour and intensity. The immunofluorescence staining protocol is designed to identify human A6, A9, and A10 cell clusters and alpha-synuclein pathology.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research (MJFF) and the Aligning Science Across Parkinson’s (ASAP) initiative

keywords: ASAPCRN,IHC, NM, A6, A9, A10, alpha-synculein, FFPE

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"nask","text":"Select sections, label the staining method on slides, and load slides to slide racks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d84f3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1aktt","text":"Check the medium and reagents ready for use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qqrb","text":"Bake the slides in a    oven for one hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ao88c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4s1hq","text":"Dip slides in HistoChoice for 2 x 7 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b2vt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ca5t","text":"Dip slides in 100% ethanol for 2 x 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nur0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlegm","text":"Dip slides in  95% ethanol for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91q6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2e7e6","text":"Dip slides in 70 % ethanol for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v3g0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m9cl","text":"Dip slides in MQ water for 3 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tt15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ip4k","text":"Dip slides in 1XPBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25g5c","text":"Note: The slides can be mounted with DAKO fluorescence mounting medium (Agilent, cat# S302380-2) for brightfield scanning by VS200 to acquire neuromelanin images, then de-coverslip in 1XPBS to proceed for the following antigen retrieval step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":242}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43sfq","text":"Transfer slides into the slides chamber filled with 1X citric buffer (CB) pH6.0, and apply HIAR using a programmable antigen retrieval cooker (Aptum Bio Retriever 2100, Aptum Biologics Ltd, UK) at a peak temperature of  , followed by the gradual cooling procedure for ~2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":219,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1bg81","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"121","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dgsk8","text":"Dip slides in MQ water for 1 minute. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ssru","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cogoc","text":"Dip slides in 1XPBS for 5minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"70sq8","text":"Prepare NaBH4 (Sigma #72320, stored in the toxic cabinet) at a final concentration of 0.5% (w/v) in 1X PBS.  Make this fresh in the fume hood!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mtpk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8o4tc","text":"Transfer slides into this quenching buffer for 30 minutes (on ice).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ukb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3hfpe","text":"Slides undergone PBS washing 2 X 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15rih","text":"Immersing slides in 70% ethanol for ~1 minute.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e35g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blqmg","text":"Transfer the slides into 0.1% SBB (in 70% ethanol) for ~30 minutes.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv394","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7meut","text":"Wash slide with 70% ethanol for ~1 minute (dip several times)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv1p2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu92h","text":"Rinsing slides with pure H2O briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2intl","text":"Wash slides in 1XPBS 2 X 5 minutes.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"divrg","text":"Set up the StainTray slide staining system (Sigma, Z670146) or incubation boxes. Circle the samples with PAP pen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dump","text":"Blocking with Human Fc blocker: Human FC blocker (BD Pharmingen Human BD Fc Block, clone Fc1, #564220) in 1XPBS 1:200 @   for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5dl0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag2uj","text":"Blocking with IF buffer @   for 60 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D1E10E0BFEB11EEAABF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fas36","text":"Make a Primary antibody cocktail in IF buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76nue","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2daet","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6n30c","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["105","320"],"data":[["CalB1(Ch)\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e","Antibodies.com #A85369"],["ALDH1A1 (Gt)","R\u0026amp;D AF5869"]],"guid":"CB5977476937404FB0AE6300C39054FF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fr167","text":"Primary Antibodies","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["CalB1(Ch)\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e","Antibodies.com #A85369"],["ALDH1A1 (Gt)","R\u0026amp;D AF5869"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0q8e","text":"Incubate sections with primary antibody cocktail in the CoolRm @    overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c57v6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

steps.section: Secondary antibodies incubation (from this step, protect from light)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5p3ag","text":"Wash sections with 1xPBS 3X10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6usl8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Secondary antibodies incubation (from this step, protect from light)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8168k","text":"Make the 2nd antibody cocktails as above in IF blocking buffer @   for 120 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":10,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ne4o","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sum3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bk5n3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D1E10E0BFEB11EEAABF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":""},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":[72,83,117,"329"],"data":[["Cat#","ThermoFisher SA5-10091","Sigma SAB4600031","Sigma B2261"],["Reagent","Dn@Gt-DL755","Dn@Ch IgY-CF488A","Hoechst 33,342 (1mg/ml stock)"],["Dilution","1:200","1:250","1:1000"]],"guid":"26DF171E8CE64E5186A99A2328628808","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"56cub","text":"Reagent list","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Cat#","ThermoFisher SA5-10091","Sigma SAB4600031","Sigma B2261"],["Reagent","Dn@Gt-DL755","Dn@Ch IgY-CF488A","Hoechst 33,342 (1mg/ml stock)"],["Dilution","1:200","1:250","1:1000"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg0df","text":"Wash sections in 1XPBS 3X5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcq0s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"422v0","text":"Dilute conjugated antibodies into IF blocking buffer as below @   for 120 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9lss9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dt4n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9h9dh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D1E10E0BFEB11EEAABF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["144","175","331"],"data":[["Conjugated Abs\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eTH-\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u0026nbsp;AF647\u0026nbsp;\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eS129-AF568\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e"],["Cat#","BioLegend #818008","Abcam Ab307166"],["Dilution","1:100","1:100"]],"guid":"33A7E49DC4E14A22932EAC899C45FD49","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9g7qj","text":"Conjugated antibodies","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Conjugated Abs\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eTH-\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u0026nbsp;AF647\u0026nbsp;\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eS129-AF568\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e"],["Cat#","BioLegend #818008","Abcam Ab307166"],["Dilution","1:100","1:100"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1miim","text":"Wash sections in 1XPBS 3X5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjoh","text":"Leave sections at dark for drying for about 5~10 minutes or dry all the solution residue on the sections, mounting with anti-fade media (DAKO Fluorescence Mounting Medium), and leave @   for \u003e30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":185,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ojbr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D1E10E0BFEB11EEAABF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cmv1v","text":"Seal the corners of the coverslips with nail polish.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c74bm","text":"Store slides in the slide box and store in the fridge or cool Rm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tgou","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"311np","text":"Ready for VS200 scanning. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7fil","text":"Home-made IF Blocking buffer (NDS):  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58rc","text":"•           2% Donkey serum (Sigma, D9663) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rstn","text":"•           1% BSA (best with IgG-free and protease-free) (Sigma, A9085 or JIR #001-000-173).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kth2","text":"•           0.2% TritonX-100 (Sigma, T9284).   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3s4n0","text":"•           0.1% gelatine (from fish skin, Sigma, G7041).   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97aap","text":"•           0.1% Tween-20 (Sigma, P1379).   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgclf","text":"•           0.01% Sodium Azide (Sigma, S2002)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lgrr","text":"in 1XPBS, aliquoted and stored @  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a14nf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

title: Immunofluorescence on human brain FFPE sections to identify neuromelanin in A6, A9, and A10
